title: your account is in the process of transfering (please help)
body: So i remembered that i have a my another account and i wanted to play with it. So i did forgot username and thant password things to recover my account and when i tried to login it shows me this: your account is in the process of transfering. Please i need help this is my another account

replies.body: We can help if this is still an issue!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can take a look and review the transfer.  See you there!
